name: Emoji Charades!
description:
Emoji Charades is the game night app. You'll be laughing as your friends act out each emoji

How to play:
- Choose the desired category
- Put the phone on the forehead of the guesser
- One or more players will act out the emoji without talking while the player with the phone on their head guess.
- To mark an answer correct, tilt the phone down.
- To pass, tilt the phone up.

Features:
- Unlimited players
- Over 1300 emojis
- Tilt your phone for new cards
- Entertain your kids for hours with the thrilling categories
- Great for game nights or while you're bored standing in line for the roller coaster ride.

Play one of the many exciting categories!

Categories include:
- People
- Nature
- Foods
- Activity
- Travel
- Objects
- Symbols
- Flags

All Emoji artwork is done by EmojiOne
